pageContext.claim: “I was doing the final touches on the China deal. And that’s going to be one of the great deals ever. And it’s going to ultimately lead to the opening of China, which is something that is incredible, because that’s a whole, big, untapped market of 1.5 billion people.”
pageContext.analysis: Trade relations normalized with China in 2000. It was first “re-opened” during the Nixon administration.
